info.title: Form Notification
info.description: Builds a specific form notification to be used for form reporting. This class reports directly to forms with pre-defined attributes.

method.name: addReportContent
method.description: Adds a report data content to the server report.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder of the content. This holder will be used to append or replace (according to the third parameter) the content. This holder will be used to append or replace (according to the third parameter) the content. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: The HTMLServerReport replace or append method. Use class constants. The default method is the append method.

method.name: addReportAction
method.description: Adds a report action content to the server report.

parameter.name: $value
parameter.description: The action value (if any). It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $fullReset
parameter.description: Specify whether the form will have a full reset after the notification arrives or just the passwords. It is TRUE by default.
